definition: don’t worry about (it, him etc)/doesn’t matter/whatever/anyway

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to have no right or ability to interfere in sth/it's none of your business!
at worst/if worst comes to worst/serious/alarming
to do as one sees fit/to play it by ear (according to the circumstances)
let it be/let it pass/forget about it
three sevens are twenty-one (idiom)/the facts of the matter/the actual situation
You figure it out for yourself./Do as you please.
not to pay attention to/to leave sth as it is/to ignore
whether it's right or wrong doesn't make a lot of difference/six of one and half a dozen of the other/as broad as it is long
